title: add & use ReRankQParserPlugin parameter [default] constants
description:
add & use RERANK_(QUERY|(DOCS|WEIGHT)[_DEFAULT]) constants
	add TestReRankQParserPlugin.testReRankQParserPluginConstants()
	also: changed ReRankQuery.toString to use StringBuilder

comments.author: Christine Poerschke
comments.content: previous patch rebased against latest trunk with one merge conflict (due to SOLR-8597) resolved
